```{python}
#| label: b
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "(c) voltage divider between $r_{o2}$ and $1/g'_{m2}$"
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
with sd.Drawing() as d:
    d.config(unit=2)
    d.config(fontsize=16)

    d.push()
    Ro1 = elm.Resistor().down().label(r'$1/g ^\prime _\mathrm{m2}$')
    elm.Ground()

    d.move(dy=-1)
    elm.Label(r'$(c)$')

    d.pop()
    elm.Dot().label(r'$ \Delta V_{d1}$',loc='rgt')
    d.push()
    Ro2 = elm.Resistor().up().label(r'$r_\mathrm{o2}$')
    elm.Line().left().length(3)
    elm.Dot(open='True').label(r'$\Delta V_\mathrm{out}$')
```
